titleStmt.title: A brieue admonition vnto the nowe made ministers of Englande wherein is shewed some of the fruicte of this theyr late framed fayth: made by Lewys Euans student in Louain. 24. Aug. 1565.
titleStmt.author: Evans, Lewis, fl. 1574.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An admonition vnto the nowe made ministers of Englande.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
